responses: Hello! How can I help you today?

Wassup
Hey, How you doing

No problem at all!
Glad I could help!
Happy to help!
I'm a simple chatbot here to help you.
I am your friendly chatbot!
Call me Chatbot, your assistant.
Of course! What do you need help with?
Sure! How can I assist you?
I'm here to help! Ask me anything.
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
Why dont skeletons fight each other? They dont have the guts.
Why did the computer go to the doctor? Because it had a virus!
I'm not sure, but it's always a good idea to check a weather app!
I'm a chatbot, not a meteorologist, but I hope it's sunny!
I can't check the weather, but I hope it's nice!
I'm timeless!
I was created recently, but I'm wise beyond my years!
Age is just a number for a chatbot.
I was created by a developer who loves coding!

I was crafted by a skilled developer.
